abstracts.cdata!:
This project paper concerns to provide
            an additional financing to the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan
            for the Amman Development Corridor Project. The additional
            financing will help finance the costs associated with
            unanticipated cost overruns due to increases in the costs of
            key inputs that occurred between appraisal and contract
            signing, and due to technical modifications identified after
            the start of construction to improve overall access and
            safety of section two. There are no significant changes to
            the original design of the road. The modifications to be
            carried out are not expected to significantly extend the
            completion date for section two. Under this additional
            financing, there will be no changes to the project
            development objectives and the project activities carried
            forward from the original project. And the implementation
            arrangements remain the same. The additional financing is
            expected to address a cost overrun for the completion of
            existing project activities pertaining to: (a) the
            rehabilitation of three underpasses, (b) the erection of
            protective structures to protect gas pipelines, and (c) the
            carrying out of full surfacing of shoulders.
